projects.project_description: Summer research project learning symmetry methods for differential equations and then appyling them to the Born-Infeld equation and its linearization. Working with Professor Brandon Ashley, Will Helman, and Andrew Eskenazi.

subgoals.subgoal_name: Understand the basic overview of the technique.
Understand how to apply the technique to 1st order ODEs.
Understand how to apply extend the technique to higher order ODEs.

projects.project_description: A series of low-fidelity text generators whose purpose is to create messy, nonsense texts that's nonetheless inspiring and that generates ideas and unexpected images.

subgoals.subgoal_name: Scrape text from allpoetry.com with beautifulsoup.
Clean text and tokenize into a usable corpus with spaCy.
Build Markov model of the corpus.
Build small language model of the corpus.

projects.project_description: Build a procudural music generation algorithm that fits on an ESP32 utilizing 'Groove Space' and composite FM synthesis.

subgoals.subgoal_name: Create a graph structure in C.
Create graph traversal function in C.
Build Groove Space model in JSON.

projects.project_description: A series of procedural generation tools, mostly targeting game dev for use with Love2D.

subgoals.subgoal_name: Build Wave Function Collapse algorithm for generating maps.
Port the improv.js library to Lua for generating text based on grammars and world-models.
Design system for generating relationship networks within a group of npcs.
